xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## Mark the message as seen by the current user #if("$!request.ajax" == '1' && $xcontext.action == 'get') #set($dateNow = $datetool.getSystemDate()) #set($msgdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.flash)) #set($userdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($xcontext.user)) #if($userdoc && !$userdoc.isNew() && $xwiki.exists($msgdoc)) #set($dateFormat = $xwiki.getXWikiPreference('dateformat', 'dd/MM/yyyy')) ## Start by looking in the user document in order to ensure backwards compatibility #set($obj = $userdoc.getObject('Flash.FlashValidationClass')) #set($list = $obj.getProperty('flash').getValue()) #set($seen = false) #if($list != $util.getNull() && $list.contains("$msgdoc")) #set($seen = true) #end ## If the user does not have the message marked as seen in his profile add him to the message document. ## Doing so we ensure that this feature works with global users. #if(!$seen) #set($obj = $msgdoc.getObject('Flash.FlashValidationClass', true)) #set($list = $obj.getProperty('flash').getValue()) #if($list == $util.getNull()) #set($discard = $obj.set('flash', [$xcontext.user])) #elseif($list.class.name == 'com.xpn.xwiki.objects.ListProperty$NotifyList' && !$list.contains($xcontext.user)) #set($discard = $list.add($xcontext.user)) #set($discard = $obj.set('flash', $list)) #end #end ## Check if the message should be mark as seen today #set($msgObj = $msgdoc.getObject('Flash.FlashValidationClass')) #set($msgDateSeen = $msgObj.getValue('seenDate')) #set($dateToday = $datetool.format($dateFormat, $dateNow)) #set($seenDate = $datetool.format($dateFormat, $msgDateSeen)) #set($seenToday = $dateToday == $seenDate) #if(!$seen || !$seenToday) #set($discard = $msgObj.set('seenDate', $dateNow)) #set($discard = $msgdoc.saveAsAuthor("$xcontext.user has seen the message")) #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
